thread.section_title: Traffic School 4 Busy People Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Traffic School 4 Busy People | trafficschool4busypeople.com | 4 of 20
thread.title: Theodore
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Theodore

author: Theodore
title: Theodore
text:
Traffic School 4 Busy People was easy to use. The prices were clear and up front. I was able to stop and start as my schedule required. The staff responds very quickly and even gave me the "Court Notification" for free when I upgraded to the same day service.
The only issue I really have is the font they use and some of the text layout could be improved to look a little more professional.
I definitely recommend Traffic School 4 Busy People.
Ted J.
